title: can't change music to bilgewater SR music
body:
Hey, so im looking through the SR music options and it says "Updated" and "Bilgewater" the scrolling works fine, but when im on the bilgewater option its the OLD pre updated Summoners rift theme? is anyone getting this problem? should all 3 be present? 

pls help i just wanna listen to the pirate music {{champion:41}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

As Radnar the bold mentioned, since the event is over, you'll no longer be able to tune in to Bilgewater music. (We need to remove that SR music option - thanks for reminding us!)

Why not leave it in there for those who like the music? It's a waste not to let people listen to the tune when you spent so much time on it.

EDIT: I think ARAM should random between the two versions of the map as well.
Its gone matey, the event is ova. QQ to best event League has had in awhile. Thanks Riot.
